Title: Establishes "Kyra's Law"
Summary: Requires the court to consider a child's health and safety when making a decision regarding child custody and visitation; directs presumptions that may be made by the court and admissibility of certain evidence in such cases; requires court officials to take part in training to handle such cases regarding domestic violence and child abuse.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to establishing "Kyra's Law"
